tutorial.title: Prepare a PB&J meal
tutorial.abstract: This tutorial teaches you how to plan, prepare, and serve a meal (a feast, if you will).You will learn about menu selection, supply and ingredient gathering, food preparation, and the final delivery of the finished product.

tutorialBody.tutorialDesc:
The meal you prepare in this tutorial includes the following courses:
Appetizer: chips and salsa
Entree: peanut butter and jelly sandwich (PB&J)
Dessert: easy-bake cookies
Beverage: milk

ul.li: Understand how to plan the menu for your meal
Learn how to gather appropriate supplies and ingredients
Learn how to prepare the food for your meal
Learn the proper way to serve the meal
